passive1.name: Glimpse of the Void
passive1.effects: The holder of the Eye of the Herald has Empowered Recall. This passive is lost when the Eye is crushed.

other.consume: Unique: Herald's Call: Crushing the Eye of the Herald instigates a 1 second channel. If successful, you summon an allied  Rift Herald to siege enemy turrets. If interrupted, the Eye is lost. Puts the item on a 3-second cooldown if in combat with non-minions.
other.limit: The Eye of the Herald will be lost if not used within 240 seconds.
